TITLE Creamy Avocado Soup

# In blender combine [12 oz silken tofu], [1 cup water], [2 cup romaine], [1 cup frozen green peas], [3 item avocado], [3 tbl lime juice], [3 tbl white wine vinegar], [1 tsp salt], [1/2 tsp black pepper].
# Blend until smooth.

{[Garnish]
# Chop and combine [1/4 cup tomato], [1/4 cup yellow bell pepper].
# Slice and add [2 tbl scallions]. 
# Season with [salt] and [pepper].
}

# Serve soup with $[Garnish] and a drizzle of [olive oil].
